Adult.description: Mourning Doves are larger than Inca Doves and have a long tapered tail scalloped in white. Mourning Doves lack the scaled appearance of Inca Doves.

Adult/immature.description: Common Ground-Doves lack the Inca Dove's scaled back; they also have shorter tails with much less white in them than Inca Doves. Common Ground-Doves also have dark brown spots on their wings.
